item.title: A 92 Chevrolet Is All You Need!
item.description: A tribute to the reliability and charm of the 1992 Chevrolet, proof that sometimes all you need is a classic that never quits.

media:content.media:title: A 92 Chevrolet Is All You Need!
media:content.media:description: A tribute to the reliability and charm of the 1992 Chevrolet, proof that sometimes all you need is a classic that never quits.

item.title: The Art of the Perfect Car Pitch
item.description: A look at what makes a great salesman: blending confidence, knowledge, and storytelling to turn every “show and tell” into a deal.

item.title: Scammed in Broad Daylight
item.description: A cautionary story about a car pickup that took a wrong turn, and how one small oversight can lead to a costly lesson in trust and awareness.

item.title: I Used To Buy More Than 1 Car A Year
item.description: A look back at the days of buying cars nonstop, when passion for finding the next great ride always won over patience or practicality.

item.title: This Truck Was Museum Quality!
item.description: A story about a one-of-a-kind truck restored to perfection, the kind of vehicle that looks just as at home in a showroom as it would in a museum.

item.title: New Plans: Will You Sink or Swim?
item.description: A look behind the meaning of the “Rabbit’s Used Cars” logo, and how it represents resilience, growth, and the drive to keep moving forward.

item.title: They Gave Me a Camaro for $2500
item.description: A quick story about landing a classic Camaro for just $2,500, proof that sometimes the best finds come when you least expect them.

item.title: Why Customer Service Still Rules in Car Sales?
item.description: A reminder that great customer service never goes out of style. It’s still the key to earning trust, closing deals, and building lasting relationships.

item.title: You Sold That Truck? I Wanted It!
item.description: A story about the kind of vehicle that turns heads, and how letting it go sparked more reactions than expected.

item.title: My Grandfather and His Car Legacy
item.description: A heartfelt story about a grandfather whose bold personality and love for cars shaped a legacy of passion, drive, and unforgettable memories.

item.title: Avoid This Common Car Sale Scam
item.description: Practical advice for anyone selling a car, how to spot red flags, protect yourself, and make sure every deal stays safe and legitimate.

item.title: Made It Big, Now Living with Fancier Losers
item.description: A candid reflection on how success can change your surroundings, and why staying true to where you came from matters most.

item.title: Where Hard Work Creates Winners
item.description: An inspiring message about the value of persistence and effort, reminding us that real success comes from putting in the work every single day.

item.title: How Can You Turn Trade Deals into Dollars?
item.description: Smart insights on how to make every trade count: from spotting real value to turning smart swaps into solid returns.

item.title: Cars Are Meant to Be Driven
item.description: A lesson on why keeping cars parked too long can do more harm than good, and why every vehicle deserves to be driven and enjoyed.

item.title: I Left My Friends Speechless!
item.description: A nostalgic story about a childhood dream car that became a reality, and how sharing its history left friends truly speechless.

item.title: "Sales" Is My Baby
item.description: A passionate take on what it means to live and breathe sales. The drive, the people, and the satisfaction of making every deal count.

item.title: Rabbit Used To Buy A Lot Of Repossesions
item.description: A look at the fast-paced world of car repossessions. How experience, timing, and instinct helped turn them into great finds on the lot?

item.title: This is how you get deals done!
item.description: A lighthearted story about how creativity and quick thinking turned a simple conversation into a smart swap and a successful deal.

item.title: Made It Big, Now Living with Fancier Losers
item.description: Reflections on how success changes the people and places around you, and why staying grounded matters no matter how far you’ve come.
